description:
Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai?  And the first adversaries standing in his way are Ryuji and Rebecca!  Not only is it a two-on-one handicap match, but Valon’s armor monsters have zero attack points!  All the cards appear to be on Ryuji and Rebecca’s side, but when there’s more to the armor than meets the eye, who really has the advantage?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Valon Shidou! Nazo no Armour Deck
Valon on the Move! Mysterious Armor Deck
ヴァロン始動! 謎のアーマーデッキ
